branchCategory.name: Plug-in Stacking Base
branchCategory.description: <p>Plug-in stacking base mounting for S0700 series.  Available connections: EX600, EX500, EX260, EX250 serial transmission system, D-sub, Flat Ribbon, Terminal Block, Lead Wire, and Circular Connector.</p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Manifold for Series EX600 Integrated (I/O) Serial Transmission System (Fieldbus)
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with EX600 serial transmission system.  EX600 system allows modular construction with up to 9 digital and analog input/output units.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, EtherCAT</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, PROFINET</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, DeviceNet</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, PROFIBUS-DP</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®,  and CC-Link.</span></p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Manifold Stacking Base S Kit for EX260 Integrated Type (for Output)
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with EX260 serial transmission system.  EX260 series is a compact and cost efficient interface to connect valve manifolds to ethernet and fieldbus network.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, EtherCAT</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, PROFINET</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, DeviceNet</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, PROFIBUS-DP</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, and CC-Link.</span></p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Decentralized Serial EX500, S Kit
branchItem.description: <p>S0700 Plug-in manifold with EX500 gateway type serial system.  EX500 system allows connection of up to 8 manifolds along with input units.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™</span>, PROFINET<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, DeviceNet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™</span> and PROFIBUS-DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>.</p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold for Input & Output EX250, S Kit
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with EX250 serial transmission unit.  EX250 allows connection up to 32 solenoids along with 32 inputs per node.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, DeviceNet</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, PROFIBUS-DP</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, CANopen, and AS-I.</span></p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, D-sub Connector, F Kit
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with 25 pin D-sub connector.</p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Flat Ribbon Cable, P Kit
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with flat ribbon cable connector.</p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Terminal Block, T Kit
SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Lead Wire, L Kit
SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Flat Ribbon Cable, 20 Pins, J Kit
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with flat ribbon compatible with PC wiring.</p>

branchItem.name: SS0750 Plug-in Stacking Manifold, Circular Connector, M Kit
branchItem.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with 26 pin circular connector.</p>
